languages.text: Каждая ветка развития {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждений{/g} Вольного Торговца имеет 5 уровней. Когда игрок набирает необходимое количество очков для получения нового уровня убеждения, ему дается определенный {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} — как правило, пассивная или активная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}. В игре есть три типа убеждений, каждое из которых символизирует определенный вид отыгрыша персонажа. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — путь Имперского кредо и спасения Человечества путем уничтожения всего незнакомого, непривычного и чуждого. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — путь идеалиста, верящего, что даже в жестокой вселенной есть место благородству и состраданию. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — путь Хаоса и растления души. Это убеждение увеличивается не только от решений, но и использования оскверненных предметов и накопления запретных познаний. Также в игре есть особые предметы, дополнительные свойства которых открываются только обладателям соответствующих убеждений.

Each {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} — usually a passive or active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.
languages.original_text: Каждая ветка развития {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждений{/g} Вольного Торговца имеет 5 уровней. Когда игрок набирает необходимое количество очков для получения нового уровня убеждения, ему дается определенный {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} — как правило, пассивная или активная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}. В игре есть три типа убеждений, каждое из которых символизирует определенный вид отыгрыша персонажа. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — путь Имперского кредо и спасения Человечества путем уничтожения всего незнакомого, непривычного и чуждого. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — путь идеалиста, верящего, что даже в жестокой вселенной есть место благородству и состраданию. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — путь Хаоса и растления души. Это убеждение увеличивается не только от решений, но и использования оскверненных предметов и накопления запретных познаний. Также в игре есть особые предметы, дополнительные свойства которых открываются только обладателям соответствующих убеждений.

traits.locale_text: Each conviction branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a mechanical bonus — usually a passive or active ability. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. Imperialis, the path of the Imperial Creed and saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. Benevolentia, the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. Hereticus, the path of Chaos and the eroding soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available if their owner has a specific conviction.

Each conviction branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a mechanical bonus — usually a passive or active ability. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. Imperialis, the path of the Imperial Creed and saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. Benevolentia, the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. Hereticus, the path of Chaos and the eroding soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available if their owner has a specific conviction.

Each conviction branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a bonus — usually a passive or active ability. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. Imperialis: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. Benevolentia: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. Hereticus: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.

This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.

Each {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} — usually a passive or active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. languages.text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Überzeugungszweig{/g} hat 5 Ränge. Sobald dein Charakter genug Punkte gesammelt hat, um im Überzeugungsrang aufzusteigen, erhält er einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} – gewöhnlich eine passive oder aktive {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}. Es gibt drei Überzeugungszweige, die bestimmte Rollenspielphilosophien verkörpern. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g}: Der Pfad des Imperialen Glaubens, Rettung der Menschheit durch das Zerstören alles Unbekannten, Unorthodoxen und Fremdartigen. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g}: Der Pfad eines Idealisten, der glaubt, dass es selbst in einem unbarmherzigen Universum einen Platz für Edelmut und Mitgefühl gibt {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g}: Der Pfad des Chaos und der Verderbnis der Seele. Diese spezielle Überzeugung wächst sowohl durch die Entscheidungen, die du triffst, als auch durch den Gebrauch verdorbener Gegenstände und das Erlangen verbotenen Wissens. Bestimmte Gegenstände im Spiel haben zusätzliche Eigenschaften, die nur jenen zugänglich werden, die einer bestimmten Überzeugung oder einer bestimmten Überzeugung und zugehörigem Rang angehören.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} — usually a passive or active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Überzeugungszweig hat 5 Ränge. Sobald dein Charakter genug Punkte gesammelt hat, um im Überzeugungsrang aufzusteigen, erhält er einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} — gewöhnlich eine passive oder aktive {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}. Es gibt drei Überzeugungszweige, die bestimmte Rollenspielphilosophien verkörpern. Imperialis: Der Pfad des Imperialen Glaubens, Rettung der Menschheit durch das Zerstören alles Unbekannten, Unorthodoxen und Fremdartigen. Benevolentia: Der Pfad eines Idealisten, der glaubt, dass es selbst in einem unbarmherzigen Universum einen Platz für Edelmut und Mitgefühl gibt Haereticus: Der Pfad des Chaos und der Verderbnis der Seele. Diese bestimmte Überzeugung wächst sowohl durch die Entscheidungen, die du triffst, als auch durch den Gebrauch verdorbener Gegenstände und das Erlangen verbotenen Wissens. Bestimmte Gegenstände im Spiel haben zusätzliche Eigenschaften, die nur solchen zugänglich werden, die einer bestimmten Überzeugung oder einer bestimmten Überzeugung und zugehörigem Rang angehören.

languages.text: Chaque branche de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} présente 5 rangs. Après avoir accumulé suffisamment de points pour accéder à un nouveau rang de conviction, votre personnage obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, généralement une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive ou active. Il existe trois branches de conviction qui symbolisent certaines philosophies du jeu de rôle. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} : voie du Credo Impérial, qui sauve l'Humanité en détruisant tout ce qui est inconnu, peu orthodoxe et étranger. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} : voie de l'idéaliste qui croit que même dans un univers cruel, il y a de la place pour la noblesse et la compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} : voie du Chaos et de la corruption de l'âme. Cette conviction particulière découle des décisions que vous prenez, de l'utilisation d'objets corrompus et de l'acquisition de connaissances interdites. Certains objets du jeu disposent de propriétés supplémentaires accessibles aux individus dotés d'une conviction précise ou d'une conviction et d'un rang spécifiques.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} — usually a passive or active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.

traits.locale_text: Chaque branche de conviction présente 5 rangs. Après avoir a accumulé suffisamment de points pour accéder à un nouveau rang de conviction, votre personnage reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, généralement une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive ou active. Il existe trois branches de conviction qui incarnent certaines philosophies du jeu de rôle. Imperialis : voie du Crédo Impérial, qui sauve l'humanité en détruisant tout ce qui est inconnu, peu orthodoxe et étranger. Benevolentia  : voie de l'idéaliste qui croit que même dans un univers cruel, il y a de la place pour la noblesse et la compassion. Hereticus : voie du Chaos et de la corruption de l'âme. Cette conviction particulière découle des décisions que vous prenez, de l'utilisation d'objets corrompus et de l'acquisition de connaissances interdites. Certains objets du jeu disposent de propriétés supplémentaires accessibles aux personnes dotées d'une conviction spécifique ou d'une conviction et d'un rang spécifiques.

languages.text: 每条{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}分支有5个等级。当您的角色积累了足够的分数，可以提升至新的信念等级时，该角色会获得奖励，通常都是被动或主动{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}能力{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}。 这三个分支体现了角色不同的行事风格。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}：崇尚帝国信仰的道路，旨在摧毁所有未知的、非正统的、外来的一切，从而拯救人类。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}：理想主义者的道路，坚信即便是在阴暗、残酷的宇宙中，高尚与同情也依然会有一席之地。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}：混沌之路，崇尚灵魂的腐化。当您做出某些特定的决定，或使用腐化的物品，学习禁忌的知识时，都会滋养这种特殊的信念。 游戏中部分物品拥有额外属性，只有怀有特定信念或满足信念等级要求的角色，才能激活这些特殊属性。
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} — usually a passive or active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.

traits.locale_text: 每条{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}分支有5个等级。当您的角色积累了足够的分数，可以提升至新的信念等级时，该角色会获得奖励，通常都是被动或主动{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}能力{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}。 这三个分支体现了角色不同的行事风格。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}：崇尚帝国信仰的道路，旨在摧毁所有未知的、非正统的、外来的一切，从而拯救人类。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}：理想主义者的道路，坚信即便是在阴暗、残酷的宇宙中，高尚与同情也依然会有一席之地。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}：混沌之路，崇尚灵魂的腐化。当您做出某些特定的决定，或使用腐化的物品，学习禁忌的知识时，都会滋养这种特殊的信念。 游戏中部分物品拥有额外属性，只有怀有特定信念或满足信念等级要求的角色，才能激活这些特殊属性。

languages.text: Cada rama de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}convicción{/g} tiene 5 rangos. Cuando tu personaje haya acumulado los puntos necesarios para avanzar al siguiente rango de convicción, recibirá una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} que, por lo general, será una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva o activa. Existen tres ramas de convicción que representan distintas filosofías a la hora de jugar a rol. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: La senda del credo imperial. La salvación de la Humanidad conlleva la destrucción de todo cuanto es desconocido, impío o alienígena. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: La senda del idealista que aboga por la importancia de la abnegación y la compasión en un universo cruel. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereticus{/g}: La senda del Caos y la corrupción del alma. Esta convicción en específico crece con las decisiones que tomes, así como al usar objetos corruptos y obtener conocimiento prohibido. Ciertos objetos del juego cuentan con propiedades adicionales de las que solo pueden beneficiarse quienes tengan una convicción concreta o una convicción y un rango concretos.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} — usually a passive or active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.

traits.locale_text: Cada rama de convicción tiene 5 rangos. Cuando tu personaje haya acumulado los puntos necesarios para avanzar al siguiente rango de convicción, recibirá una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} que, por lo general, será una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva o activa. Existen tres ramas de convicción que representan distintas filosofías a la hora de jugar a rol. Imperialis: La senda del credo imperial. La salvación de la Humanidad conlleva la destrucción de todo cuanto es desconocido, impío o alienígena. Benevolentia: La senda del idealista que aboga por la importancia de la abnegación y la compasión en un universo cruel. Hereticus: La senda del Caos y la corrupción del alma. Esta convicción en específico crece con las decisiones que tomes, así como al usar objetos corruptos y obtener conocimiento prohibido. Ciertos objetos del juego cuentan con propiedades adicionales de las que solo pueden beneficiarse quienes tengan una convicción concreta o una convicción y un rango concretos.

languages.original_text: Each belief has 5 levels. When a player gains the required number of points to obtain a new level of a belief, he is given a certain mechanical bonus — usually a passive or active ability. There are three types of beliefs in the game, each symbolising a certain type of wagering character. Imperium — the path of the Imperial Credo and the salvation of Humanity by destroying all that is unfamiliar, unaccustomed and alien. Beneficence — the path of the idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is room for nobility and compassion. Defilement is the way of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This belief is increased not only from decisions, but also from using defiled items and accumulating forbidden knowledge. There are also special items in the game, the additional properties of which are unlocked only if their owner has the corresponding conviction.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}のブランチそれぞれに5つのランクがある。キャラクターが新たな信念ランクに進むのに十分なポイントを蓄積すると、パッシブまたはアクティブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}として獲得する。 ロールプレイングらしさを盛り込んだ3つの信念ブランチがある。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g}：全ての未知、異端、そして外界のものを破壊し人類を守る帝国信条集の道。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g}：残酷な宇宙においてさえ高潔さや慈悲の心は存在すると信じている理想主義者の道。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g}：混沌および魂の堕落の道この特定の信念はプレイヤーが下す決断や堕落したアイテムの使用、また禁断の知識を獲得することで成長する。 ゲーム中のいくつかのアイテムには、特定の信念を持つ者あるいは特定の信念およびランクのある者にのみ利用可能となる追加の特性がある。
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}conviction{/g} branch has 5 ranks. Once your character has accumulated enough points to advance to a new conviction rank, they will receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} — usually a passive or active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. There are three conviction branches that embody certain role-playing philosophies. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}: the path of the Imperial Creed, saving Humanity by destroying all that is unknown, unorthodox, and alien. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}: the path of an idealist who believes that even in a cruel universe there is place for nobility and compassion. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the path of Chaos and the corruption of the soul. This particular conviction grows both from the decisions you make as well as from using corrupted items and gaining forbidden knowledge. Certain items in the game have additional properties that only become available to those with a specific conviction or a specific conviction and rank.

traits.locale_text: 信念のブランチそれぞれに5つのランクがある。キャラクターが新たな信念ランクに進むのに十分なポイントを蓄積すると、{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}としてパッシブまたはアクティブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得することができる。 信念ブランチの中には、ロールプレイングらしさを盛り込んだ3つのブランチがある。 帝国：全ての未知、異端、そして外界のものを破壊し人類を守る帝国信条集の道。 ベネボレンティア：残酷な宇宙においてさえ高潔さや慈悲の心は存在すると信じている理想主義者の道。 異端者：渾沌および魂の堕落の道。プレイヤーが下す決断や堕落したアイテムの使用、また禁断の知識を獲得することで展開する。 ゲーム内のアイテムには、特定の信念を持つ者あるいは特定の信念およびランクのある者にのみ利用可能となる追加の特性を持つものがある。
